lemma integer_division2: "PRE (\<lambda>s::nat store. x \<ge> 0) (''q'' ::= (\<lambda>s. 0)); (''r'' ::= (\<lambda>s. x)); (WHILE (\<lambda>s. y \<le> s ''r'') INV (\<lambda>s. x = s ''q'' * y + s ''r'' \<and> s ''r'' \<ge> 0) DO (''q'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''q'' + 1)); (''r'' ::= (\<lambda>s. s ''r'' - y)) OD) POST (\<lambda>s. x = s ''q'' * y + s ''r'' \<and> s ''r'' \<ge> 0 \<and> s ''r'' < y)"
